channel.title: new-urban-analytics on Nikhil Kaza
channel.description: Recent content in new-urban-analytics on Nikhil Kaza

item.title: Landscape Shape Adjusted Compactness Index
item.description: A correction to Moment of Inertia Index that reduces the penalty of being in non-square

item.title: A compactness index for urban patterns
item.description: Index of Moment of Inertia can be used to measure both the fragmentation levels and extent of fragmentation. This is a complementary measure to density to measure compactness of an urban landscape
